name: [EHDEN RA] Characterize (compare) conditions in new RA patients with/without DMARD within 1y

cohorts.name: [EHDEN RA] Patients with rheumatoid arthritis excluding inflammatory arthropathies with 1 yr follow-up on or after 2010 without DMARDs for cohort pathway

concept.CONCEPT_NAME: Rheumatoid arthritis of joint of spine
Cutaneous atrophy due to rheumatoid arthritis
Deformity of foot due to rheumatoid arthritis
Deformity of hand due to rheumatoid arthritis
Disease prognosis for rheumatoid arthritis assessed, good prognosis documented (RA)
Disease prognosis for rheumatoid arthritis assessed, poor prognosis documented (RA)
Patient receiving first-time biologic disease modifying anti-rheumatic drug therapy for rheumatoid arthritis (RA)
Cutaneous atrophy due to rheumatoid arthritis
Deformity of foot due to rheumatoid arthritis
Deformity of hand due to rheumatoid arthritis
Disease prognosis for rheumatoid arthritis assessed, good prognosis documented (RA)
Disease prognosis for rheumatoid arthritis assessed, poor prognosis documented (RA)
Patient receiving first-time biologic disease modifying anti-rheumatic drug therapy for rheumatoid arthritis (RA)

InclusionRules.name: do not have inflammatory arthropathies any time prior
do not have DMARDs during any time prior and 1y after first RA diagnosis

featureAnalyses.name: Drug Exposure Long Term
featureAnalyses.descr: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the long term window.
featureAnalyses.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the long term window.

featureAnalyses.name: Drug Exposure Any Time Prior
featureAnalyses.descr: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting any time prior to index.
featureAnalyses.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting any time prior to index.

featureAnalyses.name: Charlson Index
featureAnalyses.descr: The Charlson comorbidity index (Romano adaptation) using all conditions prior to the window end.
featureAnalyses.description: The Charlson comorbidity index (Romano adaptation) using all conditions prior to the window end.

featureAnalyses.name: Condition Occurrence Long Term
featureAnalyses.descr: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the long term window.
featureAnalyses.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the long term window.

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Age Group
featureAnalyses.descr: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups)
featureAnalyses.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups)
